name: Hero, a story of clichés
description:
Play as a hero and find the good way clichés by clichés to save your friends in this top-down action game...

Resolve puzzles, finish speedruns and fight when needed... You are the hero and you are the best for all that stuff !

Gamepad or Keyboard/Mouse 

Other keyboard keys if you prefer : WASD, Shift, Space

Made for GitHub Game Off 2022

during November 2022 using the following tools :

  • Unity 2021.3 https://unity.com/
  • Blender  https://www.blender.org/
  • Krita  https://krita.org/
  • Audacity  https://www.audacityteam.org/
  • Ableton Live  https://www.ableton.com/

Credits 

A game by Vincent Fleury

All Art and Music have been created during this game jam.  (3D objects FBX, musics, sounds, textures and UI...)
